customer_addr:
2820 SE Ferry Slip Rd
Newport, OR 97365

citations.narrative:
Upon review of the last year of water quality records, there were two periods of two weeks where the coliform testing was
not performed weekly as required by the Animal Welfare Act. From 18 January - 1 February 2023 and 13 June - 2 July
2023 there were no water quality results, specifically for the pinniped main pool, but appeared to be representative of all
the marine mammal pools. The facility transitioned from one type of testing to another and did not maintain secondary
testing capability when they were unable to get supplies to complete the required weekly testing. The facility must
maintain water quality which is not detrimental to the health and well-being of the animals. Water samples must be taken
and tested weekly for coliforms and records of all such test results must be made available for review by APHIS officials.
Correct by 19 December, 2023

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The aquarium has an extensive behavioral and environmental enrichment program, but does not have a documented plan
that incorporates all the required elements of the new environmental enhancement plan to promote the psychological
well-being of birds. The documented plan must be approved by the veterinarian and must address social grouping,
special considerations, restraint and exemptions in addition to environmental and behavioral enrichment for each group of
birds with similar needs.
Correct by 19 December, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the curator.
n

narrative:
3.106(b)(3) 
   
Water quality. 
Upon review of the last year of water quality records, there were two periods of two weeks where the coliform testing was 
not performed weekly as required by the Animal Welfare Act. From 18 January - 1 February 2023 and 13 June - 2 July 
2023 there were no water quality results, specifically for the pinniped main pool, but appeared to be representative of all 
the marine mammal pools. The facility transitioned from one type of testing to another and did not maintain secondary 
testing capability when they were unable to get supplies to complete the required weekly testing. The facility must 
maintain water quality which is not detrimental to the health and well-being of the animals. Water samples must be taken 
and tested weekly for coliforms and records of all such test results must be made available for review by APHIS officials. 
 
Correct by 19 December, 2023 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The aquarium has an extensive behavioral and environmental enrichment program, but does not have a documented plan 
that incorporates all the required elements of the new environmental enhancement plan to promote the psychological 
well-being of birds. The documented plan must be approved by the veterinarian and must address social grouping, 
special considerations, restraint and exemptions in addition to environmental and behavioral enrichment for each group of 
birds with similar needs. 
 
Correct by 19 December, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the curator.
